for file in *.txt; do
    # Stripping off '_R1' from the file-name
    temp1="${file//_R1/}"
    # Replacing '_' with '.' and renaming the file to the name generated
    temp2="${temp1//_/.}"
    echo "$temp2" "$file"
    #mv -v "$file" "$temp2"
done
